dict.acceptation: 范围；射程；类别；（山脉，房屋等的）排列；
排列；（按一定位置或顺序）排序；把…分类；徘徊；

sent.orig: They are classified as intercontinental, long-range, medium-range and short-range missiles.
sent.trans: 它们分别为洲际导弹、远程导弹、中程导弹、近程导弹。

sent.orig: Penance: New range: 30 yd range for enemy, 40 yd range for friendly.
sent.trans: 苦行：新距离：对敌人30码，对友方目标40码。

sent.orig: The range you are trying to select is not completely in the viewable range.
sent.trans: 试图选择的区域不全在可视区域中。

sent.orig: This is called short-range order, in contrast with the long-range order of a solid crystal.
sent.trans: 这称之为短程序，以区别于固态晶体的长程序。

sent.orig: Range upon range of mountains, winding water, and sea with miracles.
sent.trans: 山有层次，水有曲折，海有奇景。
